title: Fall Head Over Heels for These Comfortable Wedding Shoes
description: Don’t bring blisters on your honeymoon.
excerpt: Surely you don't want to bring blisters on your honeymoon. Shop the 24 most comfortable pairs of wedding shoes for bridesmaids, guests, and brides-to-be.
text: Better HalvesBadgley Mischka Alaya Mule HeelsMuch like an impending matrimony, the mules in this pair are better together. Each shoe houses half of a satin bow to form a perfect pair.Sizes: 5-11Colors: WhiteMaterial: Satin, leatherHeel height: 2.75 inchesMarriage MaterialLarroudé﻿ Ines PumpAn editor-approved style, these slingback heels from Larroudé are equipped with memory foam cushioning and an adjustable ankle strap. A sensible and stylish option even after “I do.”Sizes: 5-11Colors: 10 optionsMaterial: LeatherHeel height: 2.5 inchesCustomer review: “I got these in two colors and tbh I want them in all the colors. [The] front is def slightly wider than the luxury fashion houses and the memory foam makes walking a whole lot more comfortable...highly recommend!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Satin SlipperLoeffler Randall Leonie Cream Ballet Flat“Go flat! Pick a fun color or a patent black to elevate elegance,” says Lobkova. In other words, this is your sign to take advantage of the ballet flat renaissance. And in true Stella style, these shoes are planet and animal-friendly. The timeless style makes them a must-have for any incoming events or occasions.Sizes: 5-13Colors: Vanilla PearlMaterial: Textile, synthetic, leather alternativeHeel height: 2.3 inchesCustomer review: “GORGEOUS! I have a wider foot and sometimes stray away from pointed toe shoes, but these fit just right!”The Perfect PlatformKate Spade New York Lucie Bow Platform If it’s height you’re after, Dr. Lobkova recommends going with a chunky or block heel as opposed to a towering stiletto. Thanks to the platform on these Kate Spade heels, the height feels a lot less drastic than it looks. html:
Better Halves

Badgley Mischka Alaya Mule Heels

Much like an impending matrimony, the mules in this pair are better together. Each shoe houses half of a satin bow to form a perfect pair.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: White

Material: Satin, leather

Heel height: 2.75 inches

Marriage Material

Larroudé﻿ Ines Pump

An editor-approved style, these slingback heels from Larroudé are equipped with memory foam cushioning and an adjustable ankle strap. A sensible and stylish option even after “I do.”

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 10 options

Material: Leather

Heel height: 2.5 inches

Customer review: “I got these in two colors and tbh I want them in all the colors. [The] front is def slightly wider than the luxury fashion houses and the memory foam makes walking a whole lot more comfortable...highly recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Satin Slipper

Loeffler Randall Leonie Cream Ballet Flat

“Go flat! Pick a fun color or a patent black to elevate elegance,” says Lobkova. In other words, this is your sign to take advantage of the ballet flat renaissance.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: 7 options

Material: Viscose, silk, bovine leather

Customer review: “They are wearable, walkable, and so chic...they fit exactly like ballet shoes from when I was a kid—super comfortable and no blisters.”

Something Blue

Jeffrey Campbell Take a Bow Slingback

Something old, something new, something borrowed, something blue, and... something extremely comfortable? Check.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Light Blue, Champagne, Black

Material: Textile upper, synthetic

Heel height: 2.75 inches

Customer review: “I purchased these for my wedding, and they are so cute and perfect! Very comfortable which was something important to me. Love them.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tying the Knot

Mach & Mach Double Bow Silk Satin Pumps

For a subtle touch of sparkle and a barrage of compliments, go with these highly-coveted kitten-heel pumps from Mach & Mach.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: White

Material: Silk, leather

Heel height: 2.5 inches

All That Glitters

Stella McCartney Crystal-Embellished Kitten Heel

A shoe fit for a fairytale (or a collector’s closet), these Stella McCartney slingbacks are embellished with crystals for endless sparkle. And in true Stella style, these shoes are planet and animal-friendly.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Pure White

Material: Viscose, polyester, lead-free crystals

Heel height: 2 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pearly Whites

Dolce Vita Kanika Pearl Mid Heels

Dolce Vita’s Kanika heels are finally back in stock, so don’t hesitate to jump on these. The timeless style makes them a must-have for any incoming events or occasions.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: Vanilla Pearl

Material: Textile, synthetic, leather alternative

Heel height: 2.3 inches

Customer review: “GORGEOUS! Purchased for a bridal shower, very comfortable and classy! I have a wider foot and sometimes stray away from pointed toe shoes, but these fit just right!”

The Perfect Platform

Kate Spade New York Lucie Bow Platform

If it’s height you’re after, Dr. Lobkova recommends going with a chunky or block heel as opposed to a towering stiletto. Thanks to the platform on these Kate Spade heels, the height feels a lot less drastic than it looks.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: Ivory

Material: Fabric/textile, leather

Heel height: 4.25 inches

Customer review: “They are so comfortable...they run true to size, and I will be using them for my elopement in Vegas.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The One

Manolo Blahnik Sololaria Lace Pumps

It was Carrie Bradshaw herself who infamously pleaded, “You can take my Fendi baguette, you can take my ring and watch, but you can’t take my Manolo Blahniks!”

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: White

Material: Cotton, polyamide, polyester, silk, leather

Heel height: 3.5 inches

With a Bow

Naturalizer Amour Dress Sandal

Nothing says party time like a fabulous bow, and Naturalizer’s comfort and contour technology means you can keep your dancing shoes on.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Pink, Envy Green, Black, Silk White

Material: Satin

Heel height: 3.25 inches

Customer review: “I absolutely LOVE these shoes! They were comfortable to walk in all evening. I ordered a half size up after reading some reviews”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Cinderella Slipper

Amina Muaddi Begum Clear Crystal Slingback Pumps

The closest you’ll get to a glass slipper.

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: Clear

Material: PVC, leather

Heel height: 2.75 inches

Customer review: “The shoe fits true to size and is actually comfortable. Love it.”

The Elegant Classic

Sarah Flint Perfect Pump 85

Follow the advice of Alexa Chung, and stick to the classics. Timelessly elegant, you’d never know that this Sarah Flint pump houses a wide-fitting toe box, contoured arch support, a secure steel stiletto, and 6mm of extra padding. Plus, if leather’s not your thing, these lifesaving heels are also available in white satin.

Sizes: 4-13

Colors: 24 options

Material: Calf leather

Heel height: 3.3 inches

Customer review: “These pumps live up to their name: perfect. I had stopped wearing high heels after spraining my ankle a decade or so ago. I couldn’t bear the idea of wearing flats to my daughter’s, wedding so I bought the Sarah Flint 85s thinking I would switch to flats after the ceremony and photos. To my surprise, I ended up wearing them all night and even for the car ride home. I have never worn a more comfortable pair of heels...comfortable right out of the box.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Strawberry Sorbet

Reformation Noreen Slingback Pump

The pale pink heel and tiny bow accents add a touch of pastel and femininity to these Reformation pumps.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Almond, Black, Scarlet, Navy, Gold/Silver

Material: Bovine leather

Heel height: 3 inches

Black-Tie Only

FOWT Pearl Studded Strap Square Toe Flats

For a tuxedo-inspired take on the ballet flat, consider this pair in show-stopping mesh with a pearl strap.

Sizes: 4-16

Colors: 5 options

Material: Faux leather, mesh, faux pearls

Heel height: 0.5 inches

Customer review: “These are GORGEOUS! I’m going back for more!!!! Comfortable, & very high end looking”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

For the Fashionista

Prada Brushed Leather Slingback Pumps

The devil may wear Prada, but so can the bride.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: White, Pink, Black

Material: Leather

Heel height: 2.9 inches

Customer review: “I have these in two colors because I love them so much. They are comfortable, so cute, and go with so many things. Worth every penny.”

Best On Amazon

Dream Pairs Low-Heel Pump Sandals

Don’t count out Amazon for wedding attire. These simple, straight-to-the-point block heels have 4.3 stars from over 10,400 reviewers who have attested to their captivating comfort and style versatility.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 21 options

Material: Polyurethane, rubber, latex

Heel height: 2.25 inches

Customer review: “I did not expect to find my perfect wedding shoes on Amazon, but alas—I wore these babies to my wedding last year, and I didn’t take them off once from 3 P.M. to midnight. After multiple hours of walking, running, skipping, and dancing, I suffered not one single blister.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gold-Toned

Gucci Horsebit Sandal

These block heel sandals were a hit amongst reviewers, even apart from all the Gucci loyalists. Perfect for a bridal shower or elegant bachelorette, the gold horsebit adds just the right touch of shine.

Sizes: 4-12

Colors: White, Black

Material: Leather

Heel height: 3 inches

Customer review: “I am searching for comfy shoes to wear for my wedding so I chose these sandals...usually designer shoes run narrow on me and I can’t stand having a tight strap across the instep, but these fit across my instep nicely with a little bit of leeway.”

Royal Embellishment

Roger Vivier Sequin Mesh Strass Buckle Pumps

Intentionally crafted for elegance, these Roger Vivier heels look princess-worthy thanks to the tiny pattern of ivory sequins and crystal embellished buckle.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: White

Material: Polyester mesh, sequins, leather

Heel height: 2.5 inches

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Arch Support System

Sarah Flint Wedding Perfect Block Sandal

Nobody does worry-free wedding shoes quite like Sarah Flint. These lacey block heels check all the boxes for top-tier comfort: a stable block heel, anatomical arch support, extra footbed padding, and an expanded toe-box.

Sizes: 4-13

Colors: White, Black, Gold, Sand

Material: Satin, leather

Heel height: 2.3 inches

Customer review: “I love these shoes! I have finicky feet but went to a 6 hour event including dancing and loved these sandals!!”

Fine Art

Gianvito Rossi Glass & Metal Heels

The vine-like sculptural detailing on these leather-lined heels are nothing less than a work of art.

Sizes: 5-10

Colors: Clear/Silver

Material: Leather, PVC

Heel height: 4 inches
